content:
Hi everyone,

For those of you interested, one of the premier conferences in theoretical computer science, STOC (The ACM Symposium on the Theory of Computing) is adding an experimental automated-review-by-specially-trained-version-of-Gemini to the submission process of STOC 2026.

https://acm-stoc.org/stoc2026/stoc2026-LLM_feedback.html

That's a really big thing, given the elite status of the STOC conference!

Cheers,

Steven
I think they are also not checking proofs per se
They are simply checking that there is a proof sketch for everything that has been claimed and cannot detect results from literature
